item.description:
Come out for another kick ass improv session. We'll rock out some short form games and exercises that everyone can enjoy. I promise if you bring a smile you'll have a great time

Meet us in the small room directly to your left when you enter the building.

No experience necessary! Tons of experience welcome!

suggested $2-3 donation to cover room rental fees and meetup website costs

Any comments/questions/concerns message me and I will get back to you pronto. Don't hesitate to ask for my cell # if you are worried that you might be late or get lost!
item.how_to_find_us: probably in the room on your left when you enter the building... look for the Improv Incubator sign
item.name: Come Be Silly With Us On April Fool's Day!
